title: Lightning in a Bottle
description:
Regulatory capture is at the root of the affordability crisis in electricity. Public power could offer a way out.
The post Lightning in a Bottle appeared first on The American Prospect.
content:
This article appears in the December 2025 issue of The American Prospect magazine.Subscribe here.
